verses.roman:
ṣaṣṭha ślokera artha karite prakāśa
prathame kahiye sei ślokera ābhāsa

synonyms: ṣaṣṭha—sixth; ślokera—of the verse; artha—meaning; karite—to do; prakāśa—manifestation; prathame—first; kahiye—I shall speak; sei—that; ślokera—of the verse; ābhāsa—hint.
translation: To explain the sixth verse, I shall first give a hint of its meaning.
